players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Day 1 begins.

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Alice.
Alice was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Diana: "Alice was killed last night. I investigated Bob and found out he is the mafioso."
You: "I believe we should focus on identifying the mafia among us and not jump to conclusions based on accusations. Let's work together as a team to gather information and make informed decisions."
Charlie: "I agree with Bob that we should focus on gathering information and not jump to conclusions. Let's try to keep an open mind and work together as a team."
Diana: "Bob is the mafia. I investigated him last night and confirmed it. We need to vote him out."
You: "Let's not make hasty decisions based on accusations. We need to work together and gather more information before making any votes."

Charlie: "Let's all take a deep breath and try to remain calm. We need to work together as a team and gather more information before jumping to conclusions. We don't want to make any hasty decisions that could potentially lead us in the wrong direction."
Votes: Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Diana (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format), Diana voted for Bob
Charlie was arrested
